description: Chat behavior configuration - controls how context, history, and personality influence responses

contextInfluence.description: How much weight to give memory context vs. current user input (0-1)
contextInfluence.notes: Lower = prioritize user's current question, Higher = prioritize memories and context

historyInfluence.description: How much weight to give conversation history (0-1)
historyInfluence.notes: Lower = focus on current message, Higher = maintain continuity with past conversation

facetInfluence.description: How strongly to apply persona facet characteristics (0-1)
facetInfluence.notes: Lower = subtle facet flavor, Higher = strong facet personality traits

temperature.notes: Conversation mode default. Inner dialogue uses temperature - 0.1

semanticSearchThreshold.description: Minimum similarity score for memory retrieval (0-1)
semanticSearchThreshold.notes: Lower = more memories (possibly less relevant), Higher = fewer memories (more relevant)

maxContextChars.description: Maximum characters of context to include in prompts
maxContextChars.notes: More context = better grounding but longer prompts and potential drowning

maxHistoryMessages.description: Maximum conversation history messages to retain
maxHistoryMessages.notes: Conversation will summarize and prune history beyond this limit

userInputPriority.description: Always prioritize current user input over context/history
userInputPriority.notes: When true, adds explicit instruction to focus on user's current question

innerDialogHistoryLimit.description: Maximum messages to display in Inner Dialog tab
innerDialogHistoryLimit.notes: Shows reflections, dreams, and inner dialogue. Higher values may slow page load

innerDialogHistoryDays.description: Days of audit logs to scan for Inner Dialog
innerDialogHistoryDays.notes: Recent reflections/dreams only. Increase to see older inner thoughts

unifiedConsciousness.description: Include inner dialogue (reflections, dreams) in conversation context
unifiedConsciousness.notes: When enabled, inner thoughts influence conversational responses. Creates more integrated consciousness but may cause inner thoughts to 'bleed' into conversation.

balanced.description: Balanced between context awareness and responsiveness

focused.description: Prioritize user's current question, minimal context interference

immersive.description: Deep context awareness, strong personality, rich history

minimal.description: Clean slate, minimal context, direct responses
